citations.narrative:
On March 14, 2024 a routine inspection was attempted, the inspector arrived at 8:30am, upon arrival the inspector called
the phone number on file which went to voice mail. The inspector left a message for the facility to return their call. The
inspector then spoke with a facility representative, care taker, who informed them that the facility contact person was out
of town and unavailable for an inspection and would not be available within the next hour. The inspector left a flyer and
card and requested that the facility call them at their earliest convenience. Failure to provide access to the facility,
animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in
enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.38(b) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
On March 14, 2024 a routine inspection was attempted, the inspector arrived at 8:30am, upon arrival the inspector called 
the phone number on file which went to voice mail. The inspector left a message for the facility to return their call. The 
inspector then spoke with a facility representative, care taker, who informed them that the facility contact person was out 
of town and unavailable for an inspection and would not be available within the next hour. The inspector left a flyer and 
card and requested that the facility call them at their earliest convenience. Failure to provide access to the facility, 
animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in 
enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
